SpecTool.Broadcast:
1. Launch Approval Windows： Android 8.1 go edition new device / new product /new SW build 窗口期为2019年10月31号。 Android 9.0 (含go edition) new device / new product 窗口期为2019年12月31号。
2.Google BTS 最新扫描出ManagerProvisioning 问题， 需合入 patch CVE-2018-9586解决.
3.android.security.cts.StagefrightTest# testStagefright_cve_2017_18155,申请patch.
4.High uplink traffic issue from old Android devices.
5.GooglePackageInstaller security update for CVE-2019-2114.
6.Any 3rd-party app can modify the "persist.mtk.wfc.mccmnc_list" system property via exported WfoService to make Wifi Calling feature unable to use，申请patch ALPS04678943
